contact_subtitle: Do you have any questions? Are you ready to reduce cost and create new revenue? Or you simply want to say hi? Drop us a message.

mobile-landing.banner_desc: We care about solutions specific to your business’ healthy, long-term success.
mobile-landing.feature_title1: No more wandering eyes—focus their attention on your consultation channel.
mobile-landing.feature_desc1: You need to do more than just rely on your address and phone number on your website. Encourage customer inquiries through a simple, visible consultation channel. Create a satisfying experience for customers through smooth consultations.
mobile-landing.feature_list1-1: Integrate consultations on various channels into one place.
mobile-landing.feature_list1-2: Create returning customers through speedy response rate.
mobile-landing.feature_list1-3: Analyze past clients’ needs to improve your services.
mobile-landing.feature_title2: No surprises! Set expectations for your clients in advance.
mobile-landing.feature_desc2: Each consultation can be estimated so there are no surprises. We notify the estimate to customers to your inbox, and manage all pending estimates in one place.
mobile-landing.feature_list2-1: Issue estimates for each consultation in advance.
mobile-landing.feature_list2-3: Follow up on pending estimates with ease.
mobile-landing.feature_title3: Simple, sweet invoicing. No rocket science here.
mobile-landing.feature_desc3: No need to find a complicated accounting tool for a simple task. Invoice your customers automatically as soon as customers confirm their estimates. Go on with getting paid! .
mobile-landing.feature_list3-1: Smooth workflow from consultation to invoicing.
mobile-landing.feature_desc4: It only begins from the moment you are paid. Build trust between your customer and your business by making your progress transparent to your customers.
mobile-landing.feature_list4-1: Overview all stages of your project in one dashboard!
mobile-landing.feature_list4-2: Allow specific communication regarding each stage of your project.
mobile-landing.feature_list4-3: Automatically notify updates on your progress.
mobile-landing.feature_desc5: Go beyond your DIY HTML website. Stunning, professional design matters, and we can do it for you.
mobile-landing.feature_list5-1: Animate your website using motion-integrated design.
mobile-landing.feature_list5-2: Leave no confusion—only strong impressions—with our effective copywriting.
mobile-landing.feature_title6: Are you hesitating? Revisit your consultations.
mobile-landing.feature_desc6: It’s rare to make decisions after one consultation. Only 20% do! Allowing your customers to revisit your consultation reminds them of your detailed service, and solidify their decisions.
mobile-landing.feature_list6-1: Grab the chance! Send reminders to create returning customers.
mobile-landing.feature_list6-2: Avoid the hassle of arranging new appointments.
mobile-landing.feature_list6-3: Allow requests for updates on previous consultations.
mobile-landing.feature_title7: No secrets about how well the project is progressing ;)
mobile-landing.feature_desc7: Customers are always curious about how the project is going. Cut to the chase—no need to have them call or email you to ask how it’s going.
mobile-landing.feature_list7-1: No more unsolicited calls or emails about the project’s progress.
mobile-landing.feature_list7-2: Check the progress, anytime, anywhere, by visiting the website.
mobile-landing.feature_list7-3: Notify every progress, and increase the trust in your business.
mobile-landing.feature_title8: No worries, your data is in good hands.
mobile-landing.feature_desc8: Your customers never have to worry about data privacy. All are handled through a secure, advanced system.
mobile-landing.feature_list8-1: No customers want their data leaked elsewhere.
mobile-landing.feature_list8-2: All data is handled within a secure system.
mobile-landing.feature_list8-3: Rest their minds, build trust instead.
mobile-landing.feature_video: For Mobile Apps - automate mobile ads
mobile-landing.faq_subtitle: Have a question? Check out our frequently asked questions to find your answer.
mobile-landing.news_desc: Read more about latest news and our special event
mobile-landing.cta_subtitle: Successful business are not instant born, they are made
mobile-landing.service_content_1: 모든디자인에 쓰일 브랜드 Identity에 맞는 로고와 컨셉 디자인
mobile-landing.service_content_2: Animation Effect 를 이용한 impact 있는 웹사이트로 효과적인 내용전달
mobile-landing.service_content_3: 웹사이트 내 채팅 채널을 통한 상담내용을 관리자 페이지에서 Follow up
mobile-landing.service_content_4: Calendar 에서 상담, 미팅, Event 들을 관리
mobile-landing.service_content_5: 각각의 Estimates에 대한 invoice 발급 및 payment 진행
mobile-landing.service_content_6: Project의 진행상황을 각각의 Stage 별로 확인가능 & 업데이트 알림
